prompt: A whimsical, vibrant, and glowing frog sitting on a large luminescent lily pad in an enchanted swamp. The frog's translucent skin emits a soft greenish-blue light, blending harmoniously with the glowing plants around it. Misty air, ancient twisted trees, and softly glowing vines create a mysterious atmosphere. Fantasy art style, dark yet vibrant, capturing the magical essence of the swamp.
